title: Social Data Analysis Simulation Using Distributed-Parallel Computing Frameworks

context.prior_knowledge: Basic programming (JavaScript) and database concepts comprehension
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education using web-based tools (Workbook/WorkShell) in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain core components of distributed-parallel computing frameworks (message/shared memory communication, SQL database integration).
Learners can design social data analysis processes (e.g., population migration, SNS trends) using JavaScript-based simulation tools.
Learners can apply optimization strategies to resolve task distribution and scalability issues in multi-process environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
